I tried each lambda set on the held-out dataset and calculate the whole set's     perplexity. Each lambda set has a corresponding perplexity. After finding the minimum perplexity, I choose [0.16461176032353309, 0.5598203068649524, 0.2755679328115145] as my lambda for further use.

The test01.txt has perplexity 534.8147659788204, while the test02.txt has perplexity 114.91933361716188. 
test01 has a much larger perplexity than test02 does. This is probably because test01 is very unrelated to the training files so it does not fit the model. test02, on the other hand, has similar topic with training files, it has a better perplexity because the well-trained model fit it well.
